https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/96/comments:\nevent) {\\n+        event.preventDefault();\\n+        \\n+        const modal = document.getElementById('edit-feed-modal');\\n+        const feedIdInput = document.getElementById('edit-feed-id');\\n+        const feedUrlInput = document.getElementById('edit-feed-url');\\n+        const saveButton = document.getElementById('save-feed-button');\\n+        \\n+        const feedId = parseInt(feedIdInput.value);\\n+        const newUrl = feedUrlInput.value.trim();\\n+        \\n+        if (!newUrl) {\\n+            alert('Please enter a feed URL');\\n+            return;\\n+        }\",\"path\":\"frontend/script.js\",\"commit_id\":\"e03a350d73ce626dea594212f4f04b7884f8cd54\",\"original_commit_id\":\"e03a350d73ce626dea594212f4f04b7884f8cd54\",\"user\":{\"login\":\"gemini-code-assist[bot]\",\"id\":176961590,\"node_id\":\"BOT_kgDOCow4Ng\",\"avatar_url\":\"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/in/956858?v=4\",\"gravatar_id\":\"\",\"url\":\"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D\",\"html_url\":\"https://github.com/apps/gemini-code-assist\",\"followers_url\":\"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/followers\",\"following_url\":\"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/following{/other_user}\",\"gists_url\":\"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/gists{/gist_id}\",\"starred_url\":\"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/starred{/owner}{/repo}\",\"subscriptions_url\":\"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/subscriptions\",\"organizations_url\":\"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/orgs\",\"repos_url\":\"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/repos\",\"events_url\":\"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/events{/privacy}\",\"received_events_url\":\"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/received_events\",\"type\":\"Bot\",\"user_view_type\":\"public\",\"site_admin\":false},\"body\":\"![medium](https://www.gstatic.com/codereviewagent/medium-priority.svg)\\n\\nUsing `alert()` for form validation can be disruptive. With the error message element added to the modal (as suggested in my other comment), you can update this logic to display the error message inline for a smoother user experience.\\n\\n```suggestion\\n        const feedId = parseInt(feedIdInput.value);\\n        const newUrl = feedUrlInput.value.trim();\\n        const errorElement = document.getElementById('edit-feed-error');\\n\\n        // Clear previous errors\\n        errorElement.style.display = 'none';\\n\\n        if (!newUrl) {\\n            errorElement.textContent = 'Please enter a feed URL.';\\n            errorElement.style.display = 'block';\\n            return;\\n        }\\n```\",\"created_at\":\"2025-10-06T23:10:22Z\",\"updated_at\":\"2025-10-06T23:10:22Z\",\"html_url\":\"https://github.com/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pull/96#discussion_r2408942004\",\"pull_request_url\":\"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/96\",\"author_association\":\"CONTRIBUTOR\",\"_links\":{\"self\":{\"href\":\"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/comments/2408942004\"},\"html\":{\"href\":\"https://github.com/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pull/96#discussion_r2408942004\"},\"pull_request\":{\"href\":\"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/96\"}},\"reactions\":{\"url\":\"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/comments/2408942004/reactions\",\"total_count\":0,\"+1\":0,\"-1\":0,\"laugh\":0,\"hooray\":0,\"confused\":0,\"heart\":0,\"rocket\":0,\"eyes\":0},\"start_line\":625,\"original_start_line\":625,\"start_side\":\"RIGHT\",\"line\":631,\"original_line\":631,\"side\":\"RIGHT\",\"original_position\":139,\"position\":139,\"subject_type\":\"line\"}]", "annotations": null}], "isError": false}
